function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ad-hoc wireless network may interfere with host building's existing services or information/communication networks.","Impact":"Disruption of building services and communication networks.","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough interference testing and validation before deployment.","Technologies":"Wireless spectrum analysis tools and interference detection software.","People":"Building operators, IT professionals, and network administrators.","Owner":"Building operators and network administrators."},{"Description":"Reliance on wireless mesh network for data relay may result in data transmission delays or interruptions.","Impact":"Delayed or interrupted data transmission, leading to potential information gaps.","Mitigation":"Implement redundancy and backup mechanisms for data transmission, and optimize network performance.","Technologies":"Redundant mesh routing protocols and network optimization tools.","People":"Building operators, IT professionals, and network administrators.","Owner":"Building operators and network administrators."},{"Description":"Use of native Python environment for processing sensor data and additional computing tasks may pose security vulnerabilities.","Impact":"Risk of unauthorized access or exploitation of sensor data and computing tasks.","Mitigation":"Implement secure coding practices, encryption, and regular security audits.","Technologies":"Secure coding practices, encryption algorithms, and security audit tools.","People":"Software developers, security experts, and IT professionals.","Owner":"Software developers and security experts."}]}
